name: Quadrant-A
description:
A small game designed around the concept of cars stopping and moving. Allow them to pass without colliding, and you might win !

How to play :
Click on cars to stop them dead in their tracks. Click again to get them moving, and beware of collisions !

Game created under a day for practice, so don't expect the world.

Team :

Henri 'Biscuit Prime' Nomico - Main Dev and Artist

All assets were done by hand using Blender with the exception of the hologram effect thanks to : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/hologram-effect-shader-125684
